-- | GTK+-based backend for declarative user interface programming
--   
@package grapefruit-ui-gtk
@version 0.1.0.5


-- | This module provides a GTK+-based UI backend.
module Graphics.UI.Grapefruit.GTK

-- | Denotes the GTK+-based UI backend.
--   
--   See the documentation of <a>Graphics.UI.Grapefruit.Backend</a> for an
--   introduction to UI backends.
data GTK
GTK :: GTK
instance ContainerUIBackend GTK
instance BasicUIBackend GTK
instance UIBackend GTK
